What Tax Resolution Options are Available to Me?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#1C50A4″ divider_weight=”6px” _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”16%” custom_margin=”||15px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Big Text” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|500|||||||” text_text_color=”#040011″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Finding yourself face-to-face with the IRS collections process? Affordable Tax Relief is here to help.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Paragraph Text” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#040011″ text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”10px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We can help you resolve IRS tax liability and help deal with the related penalties. We offer a variety of tax resolution programs, and our expert team stands ready to assist you. We can provide the experienced tax resolution advice, guidance, and representation needed to successfully navigate the IRS.

Our only mission is to remedy your IRS problems and get you back in good standing.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”center” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”15px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px|20px||20px|false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”8px|30px|8px|30px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466″ global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

What Are Tax Resolution Services and How Can They Help Me?

Think of Optima Tax Relief’s tax resolution services as your go-to guide when tax troubles pop up. Instead of just filling out forms, we roll up our sleeves to negotiate with the IRS or state agencies, stand by your side during audits or collection actions, and find the best path to ease or manage what you owe. At Optima Tax Relief, we’re here to share our insider know-how on tax law and IRS processes, acting as your personal advocate so you don’t have to face the headache of complex tax issues alone.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” toggle_font=”Montserrat||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”1. Comprehensive Assessment of Your Tax Situation” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

When you first seek tax resolution services, Optima conducts a thorough analysis of your overall tax profile:

  • Review of Outstanding Liabilities: This involves verifying the amount owed (including penalties and interest) for each tax year, confirming the accuracy of balances, and uncovering any unfiled returns that may trigger additional liability.
  • Financial Situation Analysis: A detailed look at income, expenses, assets, and debts helps determine affordability and eligibility for relief programs. This typically uses IRS forms such as Form 433-A/B to document financial hardship.
  • Identification of Applicable Relief Programs: Based on the assessment, we may recommend targeted programs, such as Offers in Compromise, installment agreements, or Currently Not Collectible status, that align with your financial capacity and objectives.

By having our Tax Experts gather and interpret all pertinent data, you avoid missteps (e.g., incomplete filings) that could disqualify you from relief or exacerbate penalties.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2. Representation Before the IRS or State Authorities” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

A core benefit of tax resolution services is professional representation:

  • Audit Representation: If selected for audit, qualified representatives (e.g., enrolled agents or CPAs) handle communications, prepare documentation, and attend meetings with the IRS or state auditors on your behalf.
  • Offer in Compromise (OIC): For taxpayers unable to pay the full tax bill without undue hardship, an OIC can settle tax liabilities for less than the total owed.
  • Installment Agreements: If full payment is not feasible upfront but manageable over time, tax resolution specialists request or renegotiate installment plans (long-term payment agreements).
  • Currently Not Collectible (CNC) Status: When you genuinely cannot pay any portion of your tax liability without jeopardizing basic living expenses, professionals prepare and submit the Collection Information Statement to request CNC status, pausing collection activity until your financial condition improves.
  • Penalty Abatement and Other Relief: Experts compile evidence of “reasonable cause” (e.g., illness, natural disaster, erroneous professional advice) to request penalty reduction or removal, significantly lowering the overall liability.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”3. Reducing Stress and Avoiding Costly Mistakes” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Dealing directly with tax authorities can be stressful and time-consuming, especially when notices escalate to levies, wage garnishments, or liens. Our tax resolution services alleviate this burden:

  • Expert Guidance on Communication: Our Tax Professionals help decipher IRS notices, verify legitimate contacts (mitigating risks of scams), and advise on proper, timely responses to avoid accelerating collection actions.
  • Streamlined Documentation Preparation: Gathering financial records, preparing forms (e.g., Form 433-A/B, Form 656, Form 9465), and organizing supporting evidence demands precision; our tax resolution professionals ensure completeness and accuracy to prevent delays or outright denials.
  • Coordinated Strategy: If multiple relief options exist (e.g., CNC vs. installment agreement vs. OIC), our team prioritizes the path most aligned with your immediate and long-term financial interests. They continuously reassess if circumstances change (e.g., income improvement), modifying the approach as needed.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”4. Long-Term Compliance and Future Planning” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Resolving past tax issues is only part of the service: our effective tax resolution firm also focuses on preventing future problems:

  • Filing Delinquent Returns: Unfiled returns often block access to relief programs. Our tax resolution specialists reconstruct tax histories, file past-due returns, and address any penalties or interest arising, paving the way for additional resolution steps.
  • Ongoing Monitoring and Support: Optima offers post-resolution support, monitoring IRS communications for potential follow-up issues and advising on handling new notices promptly.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”5. When to Seek Professional Tax Resolution Services” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Consider engaging experts if you experience any of the following:

  • Receipt of multiple or escalating IRS notices (e.g., demand letters, intent to levy).
  • Unfiled tax returns spanning multiple years.
  • Threat or execution of levies on bank accounts, wage garnishments, or filed tax liens.
  • Complex tax scenarios (e.g., self-employment, business payroll tax issues) where specialized knowledge is crucial.
  • Financial hardship making full payment unrealistic, prompting exploration of CNC status or Offers in Compromise.
  • Desire to avoid direct confrontation with tax authorities and reduce anxiety around IRS interactions.

With Optima Tax Relief, you gain access to credentialed professionals (e.g., enrolled agents, CPAs) who understand IRS protocols, maintain up-to-date knowledge of tax law changes, and have established relationships that can expedite communication and negotiation. This proactive, expert-driven approach often leads to faster, more favorable outcomes and minimizes the risk of costly mistakes or overlook critical relief opportunities.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font_size=”18px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Tax Resolution Frequently Asked Questions

 

What exactly are tax resolution services and how can Affordable Tax Relief help me navigate them?

Tax resolution services involve negotiating with the IRS or state agencies to resolve taxes owed or disputes (e.g., audits, payment plans, offers in compromise). Affordable Tax Relief acts as your advocate, handling paperwork and communication so you avoid mistakes and get the best relief for your situation.

 

How do I know if I need professional tax resolution help from Optima Tax Relief?

If you’ve received IRS notices, face levies or garnishments, have unfiled returns, or can’t pay your full tax bill without hardship, professional help can simplify the process and improve outcomes.

 

What types of IRS issues can Optima Tax Relief’s tax resolution services address?

Services cover back taxes and unfiled returns, audit representation, installment agreements, offers in compromise, “currently not collectible” requests, penalty abatement, lien/levy release, payroll tax relief, and state tax matters.

Can Affordable Tax Relief negotiate an Offer in Compromise or installment agreement on my behalf?

Yes. Optima assesses your eligibility, prepares and submits all required forms, and negotiates with the IRS for settlements or manageable payment plans tailored to your financial situation.

 

How does Affordable Tax Relief handle penalty abatement or “currently not collectible” requests for clients?

They gather proof of reasonable cause or financial hardship, prepare the necessary IRS forms (e.g., Collection Information Statements), and manage all communications to request penalty removal or pause collection actions until you can pay.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ global_module=”12172″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”TrustPilot Carousel” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”50px||50px||true|false” custom_padding=”10px||10px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Affordable Tax Relief Help

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

excerpt.rendered: We can help you resolve IRS tax liability and help deal with the related penalties. We offer a variety of tax resolution programs, and our expert team stands ready to assist you. We can provide the experienced tax resolution advice, guidance, and representation needed to successfully navigate the IRS.
